= Contributors of TabIMSwitch project =

  * The project was originally created by Zhang Cong (ftofficer) <ftofficer.zhangc AT gmail.com> [http://ftofficer.spaces.live.com blog (Chinese)]
  * Li Fanxi <lifanxi AT gmail.com> was the first user of this utility, and gave many useful suggestions.
  * Wu Xiaoshu <Xioashu.wu AT gmail.com> contributes on Linux SCIM platform porting research.
  * Lin Ziyuan <ziyuang AT gmail.com> translated some wiki pages to Japanese.
  * The friends from [http://forums.mozine.cn/index.php?showtopic=17833 Mozine China Forum] contributed much on testing the early unstable versions, and helping to do localization, especially
    * [http://forums.mozine.cn/index.php?showuser=3 dudu8995]
    * [http://forums.mozine.cn/index.php?showuser=45135 湘雪龙]
  * The friends from [http://www.newsmth.net SMTH BBS] and [http://bbs.ustc.edu.cn USTC BBS] also contributed on testing early unstable versions.
